\n\tTibetan Singing Bowls.productDescription:
It is a common belief that the seven metals astrologically associated with the seven (then known) planets or celestial bodies were combined in the bowl-makers alchemical smelting pot to make these Tibetan Singing Bowls.
The seven metals and their planetary associations are Gold (Sun), Silver (Moon), Copper (Venus), Iron (Mars), Tin (Jupiter), Mercury/Quicksilver (Mercury) and Lead (Saturn) all of which feature heavily in alchemical symbolism.
6 inch diameter

\n\tTingsha (Prayer Chimes).productDescription: Small cymbals used in prayer and rituals by Tibetan Buddhist practitioners.
